title: What is Regular Expressions `Regex`?
description: Regular Expressions are a string of characters that express a search pattern. Often abbreviated as `Regex` or `Regexp`. It is especially used to find or replace words in texts. In addition, we can test whether a text complies with the rules we set.\n\nFor example, let's say you have a list of filenames. And you only want to find files with the pdf extension. Following typing an expression ^w+.pdf$ will work. The meaning of the definitions in this expression will become clearer as the steps progress.
